opendial.bn.distribs.discrete

Interface DiscreteDistribution

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProbDistribution
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoricalTable, ConditionalCategoricalTable, DeterministicDistribution, EquivalenceDistribution, IncrementalDistribution, OutputDistribution, RuleDistribution

    public interface DiscreteDistribution
extends ProbDistribution
    Representation of a discrete probability distribution P(X1,...,Xn | Y1,...Y_m) where X1,..., Xn are variables with a discrete range of values.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-03-20 21:16:08 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

    • Method Detail

      • getProb

        double getProb(Assignment condition,
             Assignment head)
               throws DialException
        Returns the probability P(head|condition), if any is specified. Else, returns 0.0f.
        Parameters:
        condition - the conditional assignment for Y1,..., Ym
        head - the head assignment X1,...,Xn
        Returns:
        the associated probability, if one exists.
        Throws:
        DialException - if the probability could not be extracted

      • getPosterior

        CategoricalTable getPosterior(Assignment condition)
                              throws DialException
        Returns the posterior distribution P(X1,...,Xn | condition) as a categorical table.
        Specified by:
        getPosterior in interface ProbDistribution
        Parameters:
        condition - the conditional assignment for Y1,..., Ym
        Returns:
        the probability table P(X1,..., Xn) given the conditional assignment
        Throws:
        DialException
